root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 4-1-5, translated into all languages

languages.language: Ratio between all new admissions in the last year of an education cycle (primary or secondary) and the population at the age at which this level is reached.
Rapport entre l’ensemble des nouveaux admis en dernière année d’un cycle d’enseignement (primaire ou secondaire) et la population ayant l’âge auquel on accède à ce niveau.
